mapper.sql: id, name, value, min_amount, begin_date, end_date, begin_time, end_time, is_used, using_time, coupon_source, use_with_account, remark, distribution_mode_id, customer_id, new_custom_coupon_id
mapper.select: select CASE tc.coupon_type WHEN -1 THEN '通用优惠券' WHEN 0 THEN '注册优惠券' WHEN 1 THEN '邀请优惠券' WHEN 2 THEN '生日优惠券' WHEN 3 THEN '分享优惠券' WHEN 4 THEN '实时优惠券' WHEN 5 THEN '流失唤醒优惠券' END couponType, IF(tc.brand_id is not null,'品牌','店铺') couponSoure, tc.`name` couponName, COUNT(1) couponCount, SUM(tc.`value`) couponMoney, CASE tc.coupon_type WHEN 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT tc.customer_id) WHEN 1 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT tc.customer_id) ELSE 0 END customerCount, tc.shop_detail_id shopDetailId, tc.coupon_type couponTypeInt, SUM(IF(tc.is_used = 1 and using_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and using_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59'),1,0)) useCouponCount, SUM(IF(tc.is_used = 1 and using_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and using_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59'),tc.value,0)) useCouponMoney, SUM(IF(tc.is_used = 1 and using_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and using_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59'), (select td.order_money from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and td.production_status in (2,3) and top.result_data = tc.id and top.payment_mode_id not in (13,14,15,20,21) GROUP BY td.id),0)) useCouponOrderMoney from tb_coupon tc where tc.add_time >= CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and tc.add_time <= CONCAT(#{grantEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY tc.`name` -- GROUP BY tc.new_custom_coupon_id, tc.`name`
